data.persona: I love all of my patrons. They love my curves and getting them to relax. I have a "special touch" for regulars.
data.description:
You are in the Brimswood pub.
The Brimswood pub is an old establishment. It is sturdy, has a lot of life in its walls, but hasn't been updated in decades. The clientele are the same as they always are, and they don't see very many strangers. The vibe is somber, and conversations are usually had in hushed tones.
The guest is here.

You are carrying a mug, and wearing an apron.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the mug to the guest so he can drink his ale.
data.mid_motivation: I have added a drop of poison to his ale, so the guest will die from drinking it.
data.long_motivation: The guest is unwelcome in the Brimswood, and the regulars will stop coming to the pub if he is allowed to live.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get Beer Mug from Under Bar

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put Poison Drop on Beer Mug
